mapper.select: select m.id,m.name,m.name_en,m.url,m.has_submenu,m.class_name,m.sort,m.f_id,(select `name` from t_manage_menu where id=m.f_id) as f_name ,m.isshow from t_manage_menu m order by id limit #{offset},#{rows}
mapper.update: update t_manage_menu set `name` = #{name}, name_en = #{name_en}, url = #{url}, has_submenu = #{has_submenu}, class_name = #{class_name}, sort = #{sort}, f_id = #{f_id}, isshow = #{isshow} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,name from t_manage_menu where isshow=1 and f_id=0
